import React, {useState, useEffect, useProps} from 'react' import { useNavigate, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer'; import {listUsers} from '../actions/userActions' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (
